MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH46 postcode area of West Linton. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 09:03am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of adverse weather conditions and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:17am on the 20th of January 2021.
